front.title: NIST special database 300

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: A new collection of legacy inked rolled and plain fingerprint card scans are being released to the public. The cards were scanned at three resolutions in the 8 bit grayscale colorspace. The data is available as lossless images for free.

seriesInfo.name: NIST technical note; NIST tech note; NIST TN
